bach_open_taxonomy.ModelHub.map¶

property ModelHub.map¶

Access map methods from the model hub.

class Map(df)

Methods in this class can be used to map data in the Objectiv Frame to series values.

Always returns Series with same index as the ObjectivFrame the method is applied to, so the can be set as columns to that ObjectivFrame

Map.conversion_count(name, partition='session_id')

Counts the number of time a user is converted at a moment in time given a partition (ie session_id or user_id).

Parameters

  • name – the name of the conversion to label as set in ObjectivFrame.conversion_events.

  • partition – the partition over which the number of conversions are counted. Can be any column of the ObjectivFrame

Returns

SeriesInt64 with same index as the ObjectivFrame this method is applied to.

Map.is_conversion_event(name)

Labels a hit True if it is a conversion event, all other hits are labeled False.

Parameters

name – the name of the conversion to label as set in ObjectivFrame.conversion_events.

Returns

SeriesBoolean with same index as the ObjectivFrame this method is applied to.

Map.is_first_session()

Labels all hits in a session True if that session is the first session of that user in the data.

Returns

SeriesBoolean with the same index as the ObjectivFrame this method is applied to.

Map.is_new_user(time_aggregation=None)

Labels all hits True if the user is first seen in the period given time_aggregation.

Parameters

time_aggregation – if None, it uses the time_aggregation set in ObjectivFrame.

Returns

SeriesBoolean with the same index as the ObjectivFrame this method is applied to.

Map.pre_conversion_hit_number(name, filter=None, partition='session_id')

Returns a count backwards from the first conversion, given the partition. I.e. first hit before converting is 1, second hit before converting 2, etc. Returns None if there are no conversions in the partition or after the first conversion.

Parameters

  • name – the name of the conversion to label as set in ObjectivFrame.conversion_events.

  • filter – filters hits from being counted. Returns None for filtered hits.

  • partition – the partition over which the number of conversions are counted. Can be any column of the ObjectivFrame

Returns

SeriesInt64 with same index as the ObjectivFrame this method is applied to.
